summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3836 for the improvement of the alley in block 47, Supplemental Plat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue and Belmont Avenue, from John Street to Thomas Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47125, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
